name: Super Drive
overview: Top view racing game for up to 4 players, super Sprint style, coded in Amos by Sylvain Zangiacomi. – Championship: it's a performance race, you have to come first and be the fastest on the lap to collect as many points as possible. – Wild: it's a merciless war, each destroyed car earns you a point, the winner of a race also receives a point. – Scenario: allows you to select certain scenarios (countryside, desert, city, hell) to discover them, points are earned according to the order of arrival only. For each mode, you can choose the number of races, the number of laps per race, the level of the CPU cars, and for the Scenario mode, the types of circuits chosen.
